source: TEXT_LUCKLA502_03240_SEQ_00<tab>Frithrik appears to have decided on his next project, and the chances of it involving fish are extremely high.
target: TEXT_LUCKLA502_03240_SEQ_00<tab>ミーン工芸館のフリスリックは、冒険者に話したいことがあるようだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKLA502_03240_SEQ_01<tab>You find Frithrik and Lobb in the midst of discussing the symptoms of an ailing young woman. Unsure of how best to treat her sickness, Frithrik suggests seeking answers at the Cabinet of Curiosity.
target: TEXT_LUCKLA502_03240_SEQ_01<tab>フリスリックと、奇妙な病を患っている女性の話を聞いた。病について調べるために博物陳列館で「フリスリック」と話そう。

source: TEXT_LUCKLA502_03240_SEQ_02<tab>The two fishermen are poring over various tomes when you arrive. Before their research can make further headway, however, they are interrupted by Mervyl, berating the three of you for spending your time reading rather than fishing. As Lobb explains it, Mervyl and many veteran fishermen vividly remember a time when resources were scarce, which is why they oppose any change that may result in fewer fish being caught. He suggests Frithrik leaves his present search for knowledge to the Cabinet's curators, and instead seek out a rare fish that will leave the Mean's fishermen duly inspired. Thus does he make for Il Mheg in pursuit of the elusive calico trout.
target: TEXT_LUCKLA502_03240_SEQ_02<tab>他の漁師たちへ協力を頼むため、幻の魚を釣り上げることにした。イル・メグの水没した教会付近で「フリスリック」と話そう。

source: TEXT_LUCKLA502_03240_SEQ_03<tab>Frithrik is glad for your company in Il Mheg. In the hopes of expediting your search for trout, he suggests making it a friendly competition, the winner being the first to deliver a calico trout to Lobb. Much to his surprise, you reel in a catch in record time. He bids you return ahead of him to the Mean, confident he will follow after you shortly with a prize of his own.
target: TEXT_LUCKLA502_03240_SEQ_03<tab>イル・メグのフリスリックは、冒険者と釣りをすることに胸を高鳴らせている。クリスタリウムのミーン工芸館にいる「ロブ」に「<var 28 ((Item)) F2687E01 /var>」を、納品しよう。「<var 28 ((Item)) F2687E01 /var>」は、イル・メグの姿見の湖で「フルーツワーム」などの釣り餌で釣り上げることができる。

source: TEXT_LUCKLA502_03240_SEQ_04<tab>Your calico trout leaves Lobb in awe. If all goes to plan, younger members of the Facet of Fishing will be inspired to take up fishing for more diverse fish as well, leaving Frithrik more time to attend to his administrative duties and earn the respect of fishermen like Mervyl. But first, Lobb reminds him of the task he left to the curators at the Cabinet of Curiosity.
target: TEXT_LUCKLA502_03240_SEQ_04<tab>ロブに「<var 28 ((Item)) F2687E01 /var>」を渡した。引き続き、食事療法のための依頼品を納品し、クリスタリウムの栄養失調改善に貢献していこう。

source: TEXT_LUCKLA502_03240_SEQ_05<tab>
target: TEXT_LUCKLA502_03240_SEQ_05<tab>

source: TEXT_LUCKLA502_03240_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Frithrik in the Cabinet of Curiosity.
target: TEXT_LUCKLA502_03240_TODO_00<tab>博物陳列館のフリスリックと話す

source: TEXT_LUCKLA502_03240_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Frithrik near the House of the First Light.
target: TEXT_LUCKLA502_03240_TODO_01<tab>水没した教会付近のフリスリックと話す

source: TEXT_LUCKLA502_03240_TODO_02<tab>Deliver a calico trout to Lobb in the Crystalline Mean.
target: TEXT_LUCKLA502_03240_TODO_02<tab><var 08 E3E802E803 ((姿見の湖で<var 28 ((Item)) F2687E01 /var>を釣る)) ((<var 28 ((Item)) F2687E01 /var>をミーン工芸館のロブに納品)) /var>

source: TEXT_LUCKLA502_03240_SYSTEM_000_900<tab>In order to undertake this quest, you must first complete the main scenario quest “Acht-la Ormh Inn.”
target:
TEXT_LUCKLA502_03240_SYSTEM_000_900<tab>本クエストを進行するためには、
「メインクエスト：漆黒のヴィランズ」の、
「アクトラ・オルワ・イン」を完了する必要があります。

source: TEXT_LUCKLA502_03240_FRITHRIK_000_000<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, you've come at a good time.
target:
TEXT_LUCKLA502_03240_FRITHRIK_000_000<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>さん、
ちょっと話を聞いてくれる？

source: TEXT_LUCKLA502_03240_FRITHRIK_000_001<tab>Lobb was telling me about a young woman stricken with a most unusual combination of symptoms.
target:
TEXT_LUCKLA502_03240_FRITHRIK_000_001<tab>ロブさんに、気になる病状の知人がいるらしくてね。
詳しい話を聞いていたところなんだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKLA502_03240_LOBB_000_002<tab>She's been having frequent dizzy spells, much like I was. But if that weren't bad enough, there's something wrong with her eyes. The whites have gone all yellow!
target:
TEXT_LUCKLA502_03240_LOBB_000_002<tab>ああ……知り合いの女性なんだがな……。
彼女は白目が黄色く変色していて、
めまいがひどくて起きあがれないこともあるらしい。

source: TEXT_LUCKLA502_03240_FRITHRIK_000_003<tab>Yes, as far as I can tell, the dizziness is due to a certain “thinness” of the blood, while the discoloration is a sign of jaundice.
target:
TEXT_LUCKLA502_03240_FRITHRIK_000_003<tab>目が黄色いのは黄疸と……
ひどいめまいは貧血かな……。
うーん、どんな病気なんだろう……。

source: TEXT_LUCKLA502_03240_LOBB_000_004<tab>She's been like this for a long time, and she's understandably reluctant to go outside, which isn't doing her much good, either. Is there something we can do for the lass?
target:
TEXT_LUCKLA502_03240_LOBB_000_004<tab>彼女はもうずいぶん長く、その症状に悩まされているようだ。
救う術がないか、調べてくれないか？

source: TEXT_LUCKLA502_03240_FRITHRIK_000_005<tab>Well, those ancient tomes might have something to say on the matter. Lobb, follow me!
target:
TEXT_LUCKLA502_03240_FRITHRIK_000_005<tab>もちろんですよ……！
じゃあさっそく博物陳列館に行って、情報を探してみましょう！

source: TEXT_LUCKLA502_03240_FRITHRIK_000_006<tab>I have a feeling we'll be needing your help, too!
target:
TEXT_LUCKLA502_03240_FRITHRIK_000_006<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>さん、
君も来てくれると助かるよ！

source: TEXT_LUCKLA502_03240_LOBB_000_009<tab>Without your help, I don't think I would ever have recovered. If there's anything you need from me, just say the word.
target:
TEXT_LUCKLA502_03240_LOBB_000_009<tab>俺の持病が良くなったのは、
本当に、お前たちのおかげだ……。

source: TEXT_LUCKLA502_03240_LOBB_000_010<tab>When it comes to history and medicine, I'm all at sea!
target:
TEXT_LUCKLA502_03240_LOBB_000_010<tab>フリスリックは……
いつもこんなに難しい本を読んでるのか……。

source: TEXT_LUCKLA502_03240_FRITHRIK_000_015<tab>I believe the information we seek should be in this section. Would you mind checking over there?
target:
TEXT_LUCKLA502_03240_FRITHRIK_000_015<tab>このあたりの本に情報がありそうなんだけど……
<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>さんも、
探してみてくれる？

source: TEXT_LUCKLA502_03240_MERVYL_000_016<tab>Bloody hells! So much for peace and quiet...
target:
TEXT_LUCKLA502_03240_MERVYL_000_016<tab>なっ……！
おまえら、なんでこんなところに……！

source: TEXT_LUCKLA502_03240_FRITHRIK_000_017<tab>Mervyl, what a surprise to see you here! I never pictured you as much of a reader.
target:
TEXT_LUCKLA502_03240_FRITHRIK_000_017<tab>ま、マーヴィルさん……！？
あなたこそ、なぜここに…………？
今日は「始まりの湖」で漁に出ているはずでは？

source: TEXT_LUCKLA502_03240_MERVYL_000_018<tab>I'm not here for my own enjoyment!
target:
TEXT_LUCKLA502_03240_MERVYL_000_018<tab>て、てめえらには関係ねえだろ！
またこんなところで、
漁をサボって、うつつを抜かしてやがるのか！

source: TEXT_LUCKLA502_03240_MERVYL_000_019<tab>And as for you, Lobb, I thought you'd have more sense than to throw in your lot with these two.
target:
TEXT_LUCKLA502_03240_MERVYL_000_019<tab>それにロブ、てめえまで……。
最近顔を出さないからどうしたのかと思ったら……
まさか、フリスリックの野郎とつるんでるとはな！

source: TEXT_LUCKLA502_03240_LOBB_000_020<tab>Mervyl, for once in your life, would you shut up and listen? They're the reason why I'm up and walking again. Don't you see? Frithrik was right!
target:
TEXT_LUCKLA502_03240_LOBB_000_020<tab>マーヴィル……意固地になるのはもうやめろ。
彼らは、俺を持病から救ってくれた恩人だ。
俺は、彼らに協力する。

source: TEXT_LUCKLA502_03240_MERVYL_000_021<tab>Is that so? Be that as it may, we should leave healing the sick to the professionals!
target:
TEXT_LUCKLA502_03240_MERVYL_000_021<tab>まったく、どいつもこいつも……！
魚は、書庫にいるんじゃねえんだぞ！

source: TEXT_LUCKLA502_03240_MERVYL_000_022<tab>They've got their duties and we've got ours. Are you fishers or not!?
target:
TEXT_LUCKLA502_03240_MERVYL_000_022<tab>漁師が魚を獲らなくなったら、
飢え死にするのは住人たちだ！
その覚悟もないなら、漁師なんて辞めろ！

source: TEXT_LUCKLA502_03240_LOBB_000_023<tab>Hmm... He never was one for civilized debate, but he only wants what's best for our people. At least, what he <var 1A 02 /var>thinks<var 1A 01 /var> is best, at any rate.
target:
TEXT_LUCKLA502_03240_LOBB_000_023<tab>…………マーヴィルもあいつなりに、
クリスタリウムのことを思っているんだ……。
許してやってくれ……。

source: TEXT_LUCKLA502_03240_LOBB_000_024<tab>He's been around long enough to remember the days when starvation was all too real a threat.
target:
TEXT_LUCKLA502_03240_LOBB_000_024<tab>いまでこそ魚の供給は安定しているが、
昔は食料難がひどくて……。
年配の者は特に、飢えに対する危機感が強いんだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKLA502_03240_LOBB_000_025<tab>That's why Mervyl and the rest of the old guard are not like to agree with anything that might lead to fewer fish being caught. The younger ones will be more likely to support your cause, though.
target:
TEXT_LUCKLA502_03240_LOBB_000_025<tab>だから、未だにあんたの方針に従わない者が多いが……
若い者の中には、フリスリックに協力すべきなのではと、
考えている者たちも、増えてきている。

source: TEXT_LUCKLA502_03240_LOBB_000_026<tab>To be honest, I can't see your talk of balanced diets winning their support. But there must be a way to get through to them...
target:
TEXT_LUCKLA502_03240_LOBB_000_026<tab>住人の治療も大事だが……漁業科の問題も根深い。
どうだ、ここはひとつ、協力者を増やすために、
手を打ってみるというのは。

source: TEXT_LUCKLA502_03240_FRITHRIK_000_027<tab>I'm sure there will be time to think about that once I've found a treatment for your friend.
target: TEXT_LUCKLA502_03240_FRITHRIK_000_027<tab>でも……今から本を調べないと……。

source: TEXT_LUCKLA502_03240_LOBB_000_028<tab>I appreciate what you're doing for her, but why don't we have the curators look for the information instead?
target:
TEXT_LUCKLA502_03240_LOBB_000_028<tab>一刻を争うってわけでもないだろうし、
本探しなら、俺から司書たちに依頼しておくさ。

source: TEXT_LUCKLA502_03240_LOBB_000_029<tab>In the meantime, we can concentrate on getting some of the other fishers on your side.
target:
TEXT_LUCKLA502_03240_LOBB_000_029<tab>ただマーヴィルのやつは、あの調子だと、
漁師仲間に、あることないこと吹き込みそうでな……。
放っておけば、状況は悪くなる一方だろう。

source: TEXT_LUCKLA502_03240_FRITHRIK_000_030<tab>Hmm... I tried that before, but they weren't interested in any of my ideas.
target:
TEXT_LUCKLA502_03240_FRITHRIK_000_030<tab>そうだとしても、どうやって手を打てばいいんでしょう？
ロブさんのように、身をもって体験してもらうわけにも……。

source: TEXT_LUCKLA502_03240_LOBB_000_031<tab>Can you blame them? They're not culinarians or chirurgeons, they're fishers. I think they'd be a lot easier to persuade if you can prove you're worthy of being their leader.
target:
TEXT_LUCKLA502_03240_LOBB_000_031<tab>それなら改めて、代表にふさわしい能力を見せてやればいい。
「<var 28 ((Item)) F2687E01 /var>」でも釣りあげてみせれば、
みんな見る目が変わるだろう。

source: TEXT_LUCKLA502_03240_LOBB_000_032<tab>Perhaps you could try catching something they've never seen before, like a calico trout. That'd impress them.
target:
TEXT_LUCKLA502_03240_LOBB_000_032<tab>漁業科では釣った記録が極端に少ない、幻の魚だが……
お前たちなら釣りあげられる知識と能力があると、
俺は信じている。

source: TEXT_LUCKLA502_03240_FRITHRIK_000_033<tab>Yes, that might work! Now all we need to do is locate and catch one of the most elusive fish in the history of our art. Hmm... It's no easy feat, that much is certain.
target:
TEXT_LUCKLA502_03240_FRITHRIK_000_033<tab>「<var 28 ((Item)) F2687E01 /var>」、ですね……。
わかりました、釣ってみせます！

source: TEXT_LUCKLA502_03240_FRITHRIK_000_034<tab>And to make matters worse, the last known sighting of a calico trout was in Il Mheg, which until now, I have gone to great lengths to avoid.
target: TEXT_LUCKLA502_03240_FRITHRIK_000_034<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>さん、一緒にきてくれる？

source: TEXT_LUCKLA502_03240_FRITHRIK_100_034<tab>Perhaps you could come with me, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>?
target:
TEXT_LUCKLA502_03240_FRITHRIK_100_034<tab>漁業科が管理する釣果記録によると、
この魚は過去に、イル・メグの「水没した教会」付近で、
「フルーツワーム」という餌を使って、釣れたようなんだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKLA502_03240_FRITHRIK_000_035<tab>Since you seem to be on good terms with at least one pixie, they may decide to leave us alone long enough for us to hook our prey.
target:
TEXT_LUCKLA502_03240_FRITHRIK_000_035<tab>君がいてくれるなら、きっと妖精たちも悪さをしないはず。
そこで一緒に、「<var 28 ((Item)) F2687E01 /var>」を釣ろう！

source: TEXT_LUCKLA502_03240_LOBB_000_036<tab>Pixies!? Rather you than me! Anyway, once I've asked the curators to lend us a hand with these books, I'll keep an eye on things at the Mean. Someone's got to take care of the place while you're away!
target:
TEXT_LUCKLA502_03240_LOBB_000_036<tab>じゃあ俺は、本探しを司書たちに頼んでから、
ミーン工芸館の窓口に戻っておこう。
受付がいないと、困るだろうからな。

source: TEXT_LUCKLA502_03240_LOBB_000_037<tab>Frithrik is already at the waters by the House of the First Light. You'd better catch up before he gets himself into trouble.
target:
TEXT_LUCKLA502_03240_LOBB_000_037<tab>フリスリックが向かうと言っていたのは……
イル・メグの「水没した教会」だったか？
そこで彼と合流してくれ。

source: TEXT_LUCKLA502_03240_FRITHRIK_000_040<tab>This place is a lot more pleasant than I was expecting, and I haven't been accosted by even one pixie thus far!
target:
TEXT_LUCKLA502_03240_FRITHRIK_000_040<tab>きてくれてありがとう……！
君がくるまでの間、妖精に襲われないか、
ひやひやしてたんだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKLA502_03240_FRITHRIK_000_041<tab>You don't think they'd play any mean tricks on us, do you?
target:
TEXT_LUCKLA502_03240_FRITHRIK_000_041<tab>イル・メグって初めてきたけど……
すごくきれいで、豊かで、のどかに見えて……
人を拒む恐ろしい土地だとは、信じられないね。

source: TEXT_LUCKLA502_03240_FRITHRIK_000_042<tab>If it's all the same to you, I'd like to catch that fish as soon as possible and get back to the Crystarium.
target:
TEXT_LUCKLA502_03240_FRITHRIK_000_042<tab>それにしても…………。
誰かと一緒に、釣りにでかけるのは久しぶりで、
実はわくわくしてるんだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKLA502_03240_FRITHRIK_000_043<tab>We might even be able to get this done more quickly if we make it into a friendly competition. The first one to deliver a calico trout to Lobb is the winner!
target:
TEXT_LUCKLA502_03240_FRITHRIK_000_043<tab>この姿見の湖で「<var 28 ((Item)) F2687E01 /var>」が釣れたら、
ミーン工芸館の「ロブ」さんのところへ持っていこう。
君と僕、どっちが先に釣れるか……腕の見せどころだね！

source: TEXT_LUCKLA502_03240_FRITHRIK_000_045<tab>I'll admit, I can't escape the feeling we're being watched. Is it still paranoia if you're right?
target:
TEXT_LUCKLA502_03240_FRITHRIK_000_045<tab>この姿見の湖で「<var 28 ((Item)) F2687E01 /var>」が釣れたら、
ミーン工芸館の「ロブ」さんのところへ持っていこう。
君と僕、どっちが先に釣れるかな……！

source: TEXT_LUCKLA502_03240_FRITHRIK_000_050<tab>Wh-What!? You've already caught one? I thought I'd offer a bit more resistance in our little contest, but I'll be joining you back in the Mean after I've caught one for myself.
target:
TEXT_LUCKLA502_03240_FRITHRIK_000_050<tab>もう釣れたの？　さすがだね！
じゃあ、先に戻って「ロブ」さんに、
「<var 28 ((Item)) F2687E01 /var>」を渡してくれる？

source: TEXT_LUCKLA502_03240_FRITHRIK_000_051<tab>I have a feeling I'll get a bite any moment now!
target:
TEXT_LUCKLA502_03240_FRITHRIK_000_051<tab>僕の竿も、つついてる感触があって……
釣れたらすぐに戻るから！

source: TEXT_LUCKLA502_03240_LOBB_000_055<tab>So, how did it go?
target: TEXT_LUCKLA502_03240_LOBB_000_055<tab>どうだ、「<var 28 ((Item)) F2687E01 /var>」は釣れたか？

source: TEXT_LUCKLA502_03240_LOBB_000_056<tab>As I live and breathe! It's...magnificent.
target:
TEXT_LUCKLA502_03240_LOBB_000_056<tab>ふむ、この色といい形といい……
まごうことなき「<var 28 ((Item)) F2687E01 /var>」だ。
<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>、さすがだな。

source: TEXT_LUCKLA502_03240_FRITHRIK_000_057<tab>Lobb! I caught one too!
target: TEXT_LUCKLA502_03240_FRITHRIK_000_057<tab>ロブさん、僕も釣れましたよ……！

source: TEXT_LUCKLA502_03240_LOBB_000_058<tab>Of course, I'd expect nothing less from the head of the Facet of Fishing!
target:
TEXT_LUCKLA502_03240_LOBB_000_058<tab>そうか……。
ふたりとも、やってのけたか……。
本当にすごいな……。

source: TEXT_LUCKLA502_03240_LOBB_000_059<tab>Anyone who doubted you will be put firmly in their place when they see what you've caught.
target:
TEXT_LUCKLA502_03240_LOBB_000_059<tab>若手の漁師には、その魚を見せて、
協力してくれるように頼んでみよう……。
きっとふたりのことを、認めてくれるはずだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKLA502_03240_FRITHRIK_000_060<tab>I hope you're right. If all goes according to plan, we'll be able to get a few of the younger members to go after the rarer species in your stead.
target:
TEXT_LUCKLA502_03240_FRITHRIK_000_060<tab>よかった……！
協力者が増えれば、いままで君が獲ってきてくれた魚介類を、
その人たちに任せられるね……！

source: TEXT_LUCKLA502_03240_LOBB_000_062<tab>Yes, and that'll give me more time to help here with giving assignments and seeing to deliveries, which in turn will make it easier for you to show your face down at the Source a bit more often.
target:
TEXT_LUCKLA502_03240_LOBB_000_062<tab>ああ、俺も本業の漁と一緒に、窓口の仕事を手伝おう。
いままで、お前ひとりに任せてしまっていたからな。

source: TEXT_LUCKLA502_03240_LOBB_000_063<tab>Mervyl and his cronies will find it a lot harder to ignore you that way. Once they see you're taking care of the day-to-day running of the Facet of Fishing, they're more likely to lend you an ear, and maybe even a hand.
target:
TEXT_LUCKLA502_03240_LOBB_000_063<tab>マーヴィルも、いずれはどうにか説得したいが……。
古い人間ほど、考えを変えるのは簡単でないからな……。
少し、時間を置こう。

source: TEXT_LUCKLA502_03240_LOBB_000_064<tab>But before all that, there's a certain young lady in need of help. Maybe the curators have dug up the information we were after?
target:
TEXT_LUCKLA502_03240_LOBB_000_064<tab>君たちは、食事療法に関する活動に戻ってくれ。
司書たちの調べも、終わっている頃合いだろうしな。

source: TEXT_LUCKLA502_03240_FRITHRIK_000_065<tab>Goodness me! I have to admit that had all but slipped my mind! I'm lucky I have you here to remind me.
target:
TEXT_LUCKLA502_03240_FRITHRIK_000_065<tab>はい、ロブさんのお知り合いの方に役立つ魚介類がないか、
さっそく調査してみますね……！

source: TEXT_LUCKLA502_03240_FRITHRIK_000_066<tab>I'll go ahead to the Cabinet of Curiosity, but we'll send word if there is anything that requires your assistance. I shall see you anon!
target:
TEXT_LUCKLA502_03240_FRITHRIK_000_066<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>さん、
なにかわかったら伝えるから、
そのときは、また手伝ってくれると嬉しいな……！

source: TEXT_LUCKLA502_03240_SYSTEM_000_067<tab>The next request will be available from Frithrik upon reaching level 78 as a fisher.
target:
TEXT_LUCKLA502_03240_SYSTEM_000_067<tab>次の納品依頼は、
「漁師」がレベル78以上になると、
ミーン工芸館の「フリスリック」から受注可能です。
